虎丘.definition: Huqiu district of Suzhou city 蘇州市|苏州市[Su1 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu

虎丘區.definition: Huqiu district of Suzhou city 蘇州市|苏州市[Su1 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu

虎口.definition: tiger's den; dangerous place; the web between the thumb and forefinger of a hand

虎口餘生.definition: lit. to escape from the tiger's mouth (idiom); fig. to narrowly escape death

虎字頭.definition: name of "tiger" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 141); see also 虍[hu1]

虎尾.definition: Huwei town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

虎尾春冰.definition: lit. like stepping on a tiger's tail or spring ice (idiom); fig. extremely dangerous situation

虎尾蘭.definition: snake plant aka mother-in-law's tongue (Dracaena trifasciata)

虎尾鎮.definition: Huwei town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

虎斑地鶇.definition: (bird species of China) scaly thrush (Zoothera dauma)

虎林.definition: Hulin, county-level city in Jixi 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang

虎林市.definition: Hulin, county-level city in Jixi 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang

虎毒不食子.definition: a tiger, though cruel, will not devour its cubs (idiom); even wild beasts look after their young

虎爪派.definition: Hu Zhua Pai - "Tiger Claw Sytem" - Martial Art

虎父無犬子.definition: lit. father a lion, son cannot be a dog (honorific); With a distinguished father such as you, the son is sure to do well.; like father, like son

虎獅獸.definition: tigon or tiglon, hybrid cross between a male tiger and a lioness

虎符.definition: tiger tally (a two-piece object made in the shape of a tiger, used in ancient China as proof of authority. One half of a tally could be issued to a military officer and this would be matched with the other half when verification was required.)

虎紋伯勞.definition: (bird species of China) tiger shrike (Lanius tigrinus)

虎背熊腰.definition: back of a tiger and waist of a bear; tough and stocky build

虎視眈眈.definition: lit. to fix one's eyes on sth like a tiger watching its prey (idiom); fig. to eye covetously

虎跳峽.definition: Tiger Leaping Gorge on the Jinsha River 金沙江[Jin1sha1jiang1] in Yunnan

虎踞龍盤.definition: lit. where tigers crouch and dragons coil (idiom); fig. forbidding terrain

虎踞龍蟠.definition: lit. where tigers crouch and dragons coil (idiom); fig. forbidding terrain

虎蹲砲.definition: a short-barreled mortar; an ancient catapult

虎門.definition: the Bocca Tigris, a narrow strait in the Pearl River Delta, Guangdong; Humen Town 虎門鎮|虎门镇[Hu3 men2 Zhen4]

虎門鎮.definition: Humen Town, also known as Taiping 太平[Tai4 ping2], a town within Dongguan prefecture-level city 東莞市|东莞市[Dong1 guan3 Shi4], Guangdong

虎頭海鵰.definition: (bird species of China) Steller's sea eagle (Haliaeetus pelagicus)

虎頭牌.definition: tiger-head plaque (made of wood and mounted on the front of a yamen 衙門|衙门[ya2men5] during the Qing dynasty as a symbol of authority)

虎頭蛇尾.definition: lit. tiger's head, snake's tail (idiom); fig. a strong start but weak finish
